website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable vegan protein powders available that is also organic, gluten free, and kosher.
pros: Affordable price and available in 5 different flavors
Includes 21 grams of protein and 150 calories per serving
Protein from peas, brown rice, and chia seeds
cons: Contains sugar alcohols, which can cause stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: Plant based Organic Protein and priced right!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a year. I have tried about everything out there and for the money...and being plant based...in my opinion it's right up there with the top name brands; for a lot less cost. I mix it with Organic raspberries, blueberries, 1/2 of banana, Green Vibrance and self ground Flax Seed; plus some high potency mutli vitamins with minerals and Ubiqunol. I usually am never tired and have energy that keeps me going until fairly late at night.I'm going to be 70 and something has to be helping me and I believe it is this regiment. Good luck and God Bless
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not filtered. Found bug and plastic in my scoop. Thank goodness I caught it before consuming it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just found a dead bug & a piece of plastic in the same scoop of my protein powder. I received this box two days ago. I am shocked, baffled & disappointedly this used to be my go-to protein powder. Now I gag thinking about it. What am I supposed to do with the rest of this bucket now? Ugh. Gross. Don’t get it.
customer_reviews.author: N ham.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver nutrition for our picky autistic son for the last 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: We have an autistic 6 year old who is the pickiest eater on the planet! Fortunately for us, he will drink a smoothie we make in the vitamix every day. I bought this powder and took it with me to a pediatrician appointment a few years ago and he approved it as a good source of protein and nutrition for our boy. We mix it with juice, fruits and veggies, and a scoop of frozen yogurt and it's so yummy! He has been drinking it for years. It has totally been a lifesaver for us! My husband and I drink the shake too and love it! I can highly recommend this protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stomach cramps, nausea and fever.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible stomach cramps, nausea and fever. This is not an isolated situation, I have tried this product a couple of times and had the same reaction and then put it away for several weeks and went to back to it and experienced the same thing. We have bought this in the past and had no issues so perhaps there was a change in the formulation. Please be aware of you buy this product
customer_reviews.author: N. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Caution gerd sufferers
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from gerd or have any digestive issues STAY AWAY from this product. It gave me bad indigestion I almost landed in the hospital. The pain and difficulty breathing caused by this product is not worth it. Both the vanilla and chocolate are not a bad tasting product as long as you can tolerate it. I bought multiple orders of both and I regretted i tremendously. I went back to vegansmart vanilla flavor. In my opinion it taste better and I have no issues with it whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Parone

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste and awful gut pain!
customer_reviews.text: I got this with such high hopes! Unfortunately it tasted AWFUL!! I could have possibly suffered through the taste for the health benefits but it gave me extremely bad gut pain. I don’t like leaving negative reviews but this was awful and I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Gross.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is plant based and vegan and all that, but I gotta say......This stuff tastes awful. I got the vanilla and also previously tried the chocolate....The chocolate tastes better but they both have a nasty chalky taste to it. If you've ever tried some of that powder for "green smoothies", that is exactly how this "vanilla" tastes. This is probably the worst tasting protein shake I've ever had. I should say though that the pre made versions of orgain that come in the small containers taste totally different and are really not bad. If you must order Orgain for some reason, skip the powder form and spend extra on the small cartons.
customer_reviews.author: ~Warrior30~

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has pure
customer_reviews.text: Update!! I feel shorted. Literally I order a batch 1-2 a month and as of lately, only half the container is full! 1) I feel I’m over paying and 2) quit wasting plastic by using so much packaging! Its unnecessary and I want my moneys worth. I love that it has pure, organic ingredients that you understand and it’s delicious. I usually use 1/4-1/2 scoop in my individual smoothies. It’s sweet but not in an over powering way. -1 a star because only half the container contains product. I totally feel ripped off by the amount that is in the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting protein powder. I've tried many other protein powders in the past and have not been a fan because on overpowering, not so great, taste. However, this is not like others I've tried. It does have a distinct taste, it is a protein powder after all, but nothing unpleasant. I ordered the vanilla flavor which is also a bit sweet but I can deal with that. Made a smoothie with it and it tasted great The product did arrive a day later than guaranteed. I'm also going to assume that it should have come with a scoop, since the directions mention using 2 rounded scoops, but mine didn't. My reasons for giving 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: They don’t honor their satisfaction guarantee.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and while it isn’t chalky (which I like) it is ridiculously sweet to the point where I won’t use it. On their product description it says if you don’t like it they’ll give you your money back, guaranteed. When I tried to return it though it says this product isn’t eligible for returns. It makes it hard to trust your company when you don’t honor your own product guarantees. And just as an FYI I received this item yesterday. It’s not like I’ve used half of it. I’ve used it once and will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyW

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, easy to use and dissolvable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recently in the unsweetened natural favor nd I’m super impressed. I’ve tried other protein powders at Whole Foods but they didn’t taste well and would go to waste. I recently went vegetarian/vegan and have been looking for a good protein source, and was intrigued by this brand because of its organic and natural claim. It’s been almost a week since I received this powder and have been using it for my breakfast smoothies (mixed in cashew milk, with a spoon of agave added in). I couldn’t be happier - the taste is almost nonexistent, if anything the powder tastes a bit vanilla-y or nutty; it also dissolves very easily. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: I could have thought that I already left a review for this...can’t help but wonder what amazon does to many reviews w/o you knowing....anyway this is my 1st plant based protein powder & I enjoyed the taste (vanilla bean) & I didn’t mind the grainy texture. One thing that is a big negative is how it bloats my stomach and give me gas. My stomach just doesn’t have a happy feeling after I ingest this. Oh well. I’ll try whey isolate again.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, average ingredients, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: First, the taste is great. I love the vanilla flavor, as it is mild enough to combine with so many other flavors, yet really yummy on its own. What made me a little bummed and lowered my rating was the packaging. The pictures I’ve included are just after my first opening of the container. It is only filled halfway. For the price, this could easily contain more powder and supply you for a month. However, there are only 20 servings here. Pretty disappointing. I try not to waste, and it’s a lot of plastic to go through every 20 days, more if my husband is using the powder as well. A 30 day supply would be more economical.
customer_reviews.author: Noël H.

customer_reviews.title: I Cannot Stomach This... But My TreeSeems Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use the unflavored one every day and love it so I decided to give the vanilla a try. I thought it might add a nice flavor kick to my morning smoothie routine. But whenever I added this protein powder, regardless of how much and ratio to other ingredients, my smoothies would become undrinkable. Tasted so gross and chalky, I would gag. Vanilla flavor taste artificial. As does the sweetener used. Completely unpalatable with horrible aftertaste. I'll stick with the unflavored, thank you. Side note: I dug a hold next to a tree in my back yard and buried this powder because I didn't just want to throw it away. My tree is doing swell.
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: VEGAN DIABETIC'S DELIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a delicious vegan protein powder for my smoothies! I had a bad experience with one I bought in the store. But this Orgain mixes will with almond milk, frozen unsweetened strawberries, organic flax seeds (freshly ground), and banana. Four hours later, my blood sugar was 128. I am ecstatic! I love this product so much, I set up recurring deliveries. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: New Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Vega is way better...
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy Vega vanilla protein powder, but decided to gice this one a try after reading all the great reviews. I bought the 'vanilla bean' flavor. The flavor should have been named chalk, because that's what it tastes like. Gross. I'll probably just buy some Vega and keep this as an emergency backup in case I ever run out.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this product at Costco, but I spaced and didn’t grab it on my most recent trip. I ended up turning to Amazon for the product and was pleasantly surprised by the price! It was comparable to Costco (which is nearly unheard of) and arrived quickly. The flavor is great and the macros are great as well. It blends easily into water and/or almond milk. I love that it is free of whey, soy and gluten, as I am extremely sensitive to all three.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Had a creamer base to it
customer_reviews.text: I love the orgain brand and their ingredients. The problem was I didn’t read the ingredient list of this one... I wanted an unsweetened, unflavored plant based protein for my all fruit smoothies that I use water or coconut water for as a base (not creamy). This protein has a creamer base in it that cancels out the flavor I was going for. Good product, I just didn’t realize what I was buying and it is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Protien shake!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are both getting close to our 40s. We started light workouts and eating these protein shakes daily. As all powdered proteins the flavor is not Amazing, however it's not bad and easy to drink with your choice of water or whatever to mix it with. My wife has already lost 4 pounds and I have unbelievably lost 27 pounds in 2 months. I drink one everyday after my workout. I have concept 2 row machine and the combination of exercise and nutritional shakes is paying off fast. Great product and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SilversX

customer_reviews.title: Stomach
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this protein powder for my morning shakes and it tastes great but I started getting an upset stomach. I’ve discontinued using it and my stomach problems went away. I think it’s from the Erythritol that it contains. Won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol PA

customer_reviews.title: Gross & gritty.
customer_reviews.text: Gross flavor that I couldn’t cover up with other smoothie ingredients, also has a gritty texture and the serving size is “two scoops” and mine DID NOT COME WITH A SCOOP! How stupid! If you’re going to have a serving size at least make it in tablespoons or something that I can measure out. At one point I had to get a container and measure out 46g on my food scale because apparently that’s what “two scoops” means to them. Super annoying. Will not be purchasing again, total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee J.

customer_reviews.title: Ten scoops, not 20.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed immediately when I opened on the seventh and it was half full. OK, contents do settle, this much? Well today is the 26th and I’m out. I found this to be a common issue in many other reviews. I only used ONE full scoop instead of two. It’s delicious and I love it. I am a little leary about the ingredient (forgot exactly) some creamer base. Does not clump. If taken two scoops as recommended, it would lasts about 10 days, not 20. I don’t support companies like.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Colville

customer_reviews.title: Caused gas & bloating
customer_reviews.text: Used this only intermittently, while changing my diet in other ways, so it took longer than it should have the figure out this was the cause of my flatulence, which is noted on other reviews. It tasted fine and blended well, but they physical symptoms cancelled those good qualities. I'm celiac and have GI issues, so am sensitive; if you don't have underlying issues it might be fine, but warning to those who don't have a steel GI system!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best-tasting, best-feeling vegan protein.
customer_reviews.text: I'm easily put off by flavors and textures, and this protein powder (vanilla) is the only one I've found that works for me. It's comparable to whey protein, but without the heavy aftertaste and negative health effects. I've been using this powder for about six months now, almost daily, and it's made a huge positive difference in my overall health. I suffer from migraines, widespread pain, and an autoimmune disorder. I think this has really helped me build some of the muscles my body was struggling to keep strong! I mix two scoops with frozen strawberries and bananas (I've found those to be the perfect flavor and texture mix), and either almond milk or cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great, sustaining protein!
customer_reviews.text: I have never consistently had protein powder before but I am trying to drink just a protein shake throughout the day and then only have one meal in the evening. I like this stuff! It tastes great. It is fairly sweet but I mix mine with flaxseed milk and water. It didn’t mix terribly well with just a spoon but I got a blender bottle and now it mixes perfectly. I also add matcha tea powder. I love that this has no soy. The protein sustains me all day. I actually only have one scoop instead of two and that is enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Brown

customer_reviews.title: Okay but chalky and large serving size
customer_reviews.text: A full serving (2 scoops) is A LOT of powder. The scoops are very large. This made making a protein shake with some frozen fruit in a smaller cup-style blender challenging. You have to add a substantial amount of liquid in order to get a reasonable consistency. The taste isn’t bad - it’s a little chalky like most plant-based protein powders I’ve had. I don’t think I would be able to drink it with water or plant milk plain from a blender bottle. Chalk sludge city. Otherwise, it’s alright. It’s not throw away gross but not great either.
customer_reviews.author: adogowner

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to use less animal products, and one final sticking point in that journey has been a plant-based replacement for protein powder. This one will definitely not be that replacement. Although labeled "vanilla bean" flavor, there is neither vanilla aroma, nor vanilla taste. It looks like wallpaper paste, and I'd venture a guess the taste is similar. I even tried adding cinnamon, ginger, and clove. Still horrible. A big tall glass of nope for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Companion for building endurance
customer_reviews.text: I finished half of this guy. It was a pleasant experience. The protein content might be lesser but whatever is there gets the work done. I used this in a intermittent fasting diet with emphasis on consuming less to build maximum endurance. And I would be wrong not to say this has been my best companion in this journey. I am physically in the best shape, got to half marathons and 200+ push ups in matter of 1-1.5months. Thanks to this product. Oops forgot to mention the best part. This is vegan and tasty !
customer_reviews.author: Derek twist

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Pain after drinking this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my first shake earlier today, and it's 7pm now. I am in so much pain i can't believe it. My guts are bloated and rumbling and in pain. I took a dose of Kaopectate and im stretched out flat hoping this will go away. I decided to read the bad reviews about this powder, Orgain Organic plant based, and wow, this is my problem.
customer_reviews.author: 25jellybeans

customer_reviews.title: Something in formulation has changed
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for years. First from Costco, and then when they stopped carrying this particular type, from Amazon. Sometime between Dec 2019 and Oct 2020, the formula or sourcing has changed. What was a perfect vegan protein powder has now started causing stomach issues, nausea, bloating, acidic stomach, even a somewhat allergic reaction. Levels of reaction within the household are different, but everyone felt some level of distress. Couldn't believe it was this powder, but after couple of trials of stopping its use, then retaking, its now clear it's the culprit. Be very careful if you are getting these symptoms. Something has changed. We are discontinuing its use.
customer_reviews.author: Durrell fan

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't take the taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing the unsweetened, unflavored version, but wow, it was disgusting. I tried blending with fruit and adding to almond milk alone. I almost gagged after the first time. The ingredients are clean and vegan, but it definitely is NOT unflavored. I have only one item I can compare it to: if you've ever smelled or tasted the powder used to make milk for calves, this is exactly what it reminds me of--barf! BTW: It arrived on time without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely YUCKY not not not for children
customer_reviews.text: omg i cannot fathom why people like this. it doesnt blend even with a stick blender so it's lumpy and totally unpalatable. i gave it away as i couldn't stomach it. and BTW this product is NOT NOT NOT NOT recommended for children!!! Ask your pediatrician if you don't believe me. the manufacturer INCREDIBLY IRRESPONSIBLY implies in their ads that one can this to kids-- a lawsuit waiting to happen!! just noticing pictures of kids here on the reviews drinking it out of sippy cups!! omg really? just so not okay!
customer_reviews.author: Yrofthetiger

customer_reviews.title: Order from the orgain website!!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who orders this needs to just go to the orgain website. They ALWAYS have a deal running, and it’s always cheaper than amazon! And they do a BOGO once a year! And bonus, more money to the company that is conflict free less money to amazon billionaires. :)
customer_reviews.author: BreD

customer_reviews.title: something wrong here...
customer_reviews.text: purchased from Amazon.com, LLC. I've been using Orgain Protein Powder for over 5 years and love it, BUT this container is different. It does not taste good and it is darker in color than any that I've had before. The expiration date stamped on the bottom is two years out, so that isn't the issue. When purchasing from Amazon.com, LLC who am I buying this product from??? Do people actually make counterfeit protein powder??? That seems unlikely, but maybe I'm naive. Will only buy from whole foods or costco in future.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahD

customer_reviews.title: Warning: disgusting, and apparently not eligible for return?!?
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in coffee, thinking the vanilla flavor would be perfect. I was excited to have a complete protein that could dissolve in hot liquids wirh no congealing. No matter how much I stirred and stirred, the powder did not dissolve. And the taste was not even close to anything resembling vanilla - And...when I tried to start a return, was notified that the seller does not accept returns - even though this was a Prime purchase Unacceptable! Clearly, I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne423

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Leaves a caulk taste in my mouth. I tried mixing with milk. I shook and shook -even with the stainless mixing ball. Still would not dissolve. Also, I think it wasteful to have a huge container half full. Either fill up the container and charge more, or reduce the package size. If you are expecting EAS Whey, don’t order this!
customer_reviews.author: C. T.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found an unsweetened protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because this isn't sickeningly sweet like the others I tried. Not sure why others complain about the taste, I think it tastes fine and I didn't know flavor was the reason you bought protein powder. Just drink it already or maybe you prefer some wimpy Starbucks concoction.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Natural my @$$
customer_reviews.text: "Natural flavoring" is listed twice on the label. As that's a catch all and MSG can be listed as natural flavors. If like to know exactly what is in there under natural flavors. It has a chemical taste. Whatever they are hiding in there taste funny..... And the garbage gave me horrible gas...... This product gets a fast pass to the garbage
customer_reviews.author: hoax

customer_reviews.title: High Qualjty, No Sugar, High Protein, Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've reordered this product now about three times. I really like that it is not a sweetened product with Stevie or sugar. The Vanilla Bean flavor has a very faint sweet flavor not sure from what but it's natural whatever it is as the sugar content is 0. It mixes very well with Almond milk in my smoothies and has a high protein content which leaves me feeling energetic throughout the day. I can't say enough about this product and good price too for the quality !!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dymek

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use an actual blender to blend mine, not a blending cup (those have never worked well for me). This prevents any of the clumpiness that some people have mentioned. I’ve also found that it works best when you mix it with other stuff. I use frozen bananas, peanut butter, and almond milk. It tastes like a milkshake! Most protein powders have some sort of aftertaste if you don’t mix it with anything but water. This is typical. Don’t be silly- just mix it with other stuff! The vanilla flavor will blend really well! I’m vegan and allergic to whey/dairy so I am very pleased with this overall.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY OVERSIZED PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: OK we get it. the powder settles..... they should take into consideration when they package the products, because there is at least 50% unused space in the giant container of protein powder. I get it. I wanted a lot of powder. Though the size of this container could EASILY be reduced by half. Saving plastic made just so the manufacturer thinks the customer is thinking they are getting more for their money or something. THEY ARE WRONG. it makes me think less of your product that you waste so much material just for a perceived value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: I rarely leave any reviews but this stuff I great! I use to use different whey proteins and ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave any reviews but this stuff I great! I use to use different whey proteins and the switched to the pre-canned "pure protein". I decided to eliminate dairy (casein and whey) from my diet. This stuff (vanilla) tastes better and not artificial. Also, it has full aminos (not listed on the label but it does). Comparatively to he whey + with aminos from Walmart, this has appromatey just over half the dosage of aminos but it's still great, plus you don't have the chloresterol or artificial bs you don't want to be consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Dave.

customer_reviews.title: The container was filled only halfway
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this powder 5 stars if it weren't for the fact that the container came halfway full. I would have rather received a smaller container that was full. But other than that, the taste is great! I have been blending strawberries, a banana, walnuts, coconut milk and cinnamon with 2 scoops of powder and it taste SOOOOOO good!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein based shake for the last two years and never had an issue with it until my last purchased. The product taste horrible it even has a different color (more darker) I’m so disappointed since I have always used it and now not sure if is a problem with the company itself or people are counterfeiting the product. I strongly recommend not to buy. It is not the same product. Now I’m not sure what other options are out there for a plant based protein powder with a good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Skip this protein powder, it’s flat-out vile.
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to keep this short and sweet. It mixes somewhat well, but this protein powder tastes AWFUL. I’ve tried a lot of different ones, and wanted an alternative to whey protein powders. If you’re considering a non-dairy protein, please do yourself a favor and skip this one. It’s vile. Positively vile. The second it hit my tongue I spit it out, and had the urge to vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Arbonne powder mix, no regular sugar
customer_reviews.text: I was getting Arbonne powder for a long time, but it's expensive and it has cane sugar in it. Not great when you need to cut your sugar intake. Orgain uses Erythritol and Stevia instead. So I tried the Orgain Vanilla powder, fully expecting it to also be chalky and gross, but it actually tastes good. Doesn't have a chalky taste like the Vega stuff I've tried and blends well in my Nutri-Bullet. My recipe is: 4-5 ounces of frozen spinach, 2 ounces of frozen banana, and 2 ounces of frozen cranberries. Mix in the 2 scoops of Orgain vanilla powder and add water. 30-45 seconds later, I have breakfast and it keeps my stomach happy for a while.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cragg

customer_reviews.title: Great favor. Makes smoothies nice and creamy
customer_reviews.text: Great favor. Makes smoothies nice and creamy. I gave out a few sample to a couple of my friends. Due their past experiences with protein powder was that were chalky. All three of us were doing the 10 Day Green Smoothie Cleanse by JJ Smith. Both friends purchased it. Quote from friends "this protein powder is yummy please resend photo of brand" and the other " this stuff has a really great favor, it also makes the smoothie like velvet" . We purchased the 10 Day Green Smoothie Cleanse book from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Czuchra

customer_reviews.title: gut feeling worse than the taste
customer_reviews.text: I think the guar gum hurt my stomach while mountain biking. Not sure it was the guar but I typically avoid the stuff and never feel the way this stuff made me feel. This stuff was unsettling, especially on an empty stomach. I'm a dedicated rookie that mountain bike rides 100 - 160 miles a week. I ended up throwing this stuff away after trying it on 7 rides.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty good but needs clean packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting vegan protein powder I’ve found, it blends pretty well in a shaker bottle it just takes some effort. I’ve been using this product in my smoothie for years and my only real complaint is the packaging. I’m so happy that the product is clean but I hate these giant plastic containers. I know I can recycle but why not just make the product available in a resealable pouch? I’m looking at switching to a different brand because of this. These containers take up so much room in the recycling and I don’t have much faith in that system anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J.Cris

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous! Works Well With Metabolism Reset Diet
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for me with the Metabolism Reset Diet (see book by Dr. Chrstianson). Within one week cravings were gone for first time in 60 years! 2 healthy smoothies per day plus one regular healthy meal with resistant starch in smoothies and meal. Yes I have had some digestive issues getting used to it - but just during the first few days. I'm starting week 2. Will let you know if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Gross, Do no reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a plant based protein powder for my smoothies and the reviews, overall, were favorable. However, this protein powder tasted so gross, I could hardly consume it. I bought both the vanilla and the chocolate. I can handle the chocolate but the vanilla has such a gross chemical taste. The ingredient list looks good and it blends very nicely, in a blender or a blender bottle, but I can't handle the taste. I'm not sure if it was the taste or something else but the two times I used this protein powder my stomach hurt so bad. I would not recommend purchasing the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey and Kylie

customer_reviews.title: but not a great natural flavor
customer_reviews.text: by comparing this product to other brands, i can see why it's cheaper. The natural flavor goes well with smoothies, but not a great natural flavor. Also the container is too large for the content it carries. I was disappointed to see that the container was filled halfway, sure the powder packs a bit and I'm sure I'm getting what's advertised. But what's the point of all that extra plastic? Also doesn't fit my cabinets as other brands. Maybe a in store shelf technique to drive sells with a bigger container, but if I'm getting this delivered. I'd expect something friendlier.
customer_reviews.author: Boomselect4

customer_reviews.title: Not too chalky
customer_reviews.text: Mixes really well in a blender. I mix it with some kombutcha for a "milk shake" in the mornings. 8 oz glass and I'm good until 5ish hours later! Seems to curb my appetite because keeping blood sugar stable, I'm guessing. I get the vanilla but the chocolate also works well for my "shake" although, the taste alone is not very chocolatey..more mild. I can find this for about the same price elsewhere but I sure like knowing it hasn't been sitting on a store shelf for....?AND, who doesn't love Amazon "presents" at their door!
customer_reviews.author: Judy R

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! <3
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product this week (and quite possibly ever). Flavorless, unsweetened protein powder. My complaints about protein powder in the past have always been regarding taste (be it the flavor, or the sweetener they use). This is WONDERFUL because I can put it in my smoothies (which are already sweetened by bananas, dates, etc) without adding extra calories OR an unpleasant aftertaste. And a big PLUS for this one is that it is plant based (no whey), which means it doesn't upset my stomach the way milk products tend to! LOVE LOVE LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as big as I thought, and not a fan of the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was experimenting to see if I liked this or the chocolate better. DEFINITELY like the chocolate better. But the biggest thing is I was disappointed about was the size. I thought it was the same size as the ones I get at Costco for $21 (which are about 50% bigger). Nope. Well, at least there's less of this flavor to shove down my throat until I get back to the better flavor. Good ingredients, though. Also, I noticed this stuff, after shaken up, has an unpleasant frothiness that takes a long time to disappear, compared to the chocolate flavor. It's like the "head" of a beer. Strange that just changing the flavor would have this effect.
customer_reviews.author: Squizzit

customer_reviews.title: Half Empty
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today literally half empty. Are you kidding? Really makes me question the integrity of the product and whether or not it’s been tampered with. I’ll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Turchie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product only comes around 50% full/ empty. I have ordered twice and both times the powder is up/down to the black letters on the tub. It does not blend we at all I tried putting more liquid and only 1 scoop still does not blend well. The taste is great I only tired vanilla. If you used 2 scoops as direced its pretty gritty due to it does not blend well. Useing 1 scoop works alot better. I like it as a meal replacement but would not use it as a post workout protin. Im will more then likely not oder this again due to poor blending and only 50% full/empty.
customer_reviews.author: Nutty

customer_reviews.title: Very palatable. Dairy and artificial sweetener free
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding something I want to eat for breakfast. I can't tolerate dairy, so that rules out most shakes. I heard about this brand and was using their Chocolate flavor and loved it! But, it contains xylitol and that makes me sick. My search for a dairy and sugar substitute free protein bought me right back to Orgain. The downside to this Natural Unsweetened one is that it costs more for less than the other varieties. The taste reminds me of Cheerios or baby formula. It tastes alright, not at all nasty. It blends well. And isn't gritty.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Banana

customer_reviews.title: Sodium levels higher than in product photo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was searching for a low sodium, plant-based protein powder. This products label in the photo description says 180 mg/serving of sodium, when the actual bottle says 270 mg. The problem with many vegan products is they are very high in sodium—especially meat substitutes, and pre-packaged meals. This was disappointing when I received it. The powder itself tastes good and mixes well. If you’re concerned about sodium levels —be informed. Actual product you receive is different than the products label in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Squidward

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE TASTING PROTEIN!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THEEEEEEEEE BEST tasting protein Ive ever had! I have tried 100s of brands over the past 25 years - and work out regularly with a trainer and most of my friends are body builders ( so I'm in the " know"). This is the best product and I will always buy it! Love both Vanilla and Chocolate. I mix the vanilla with cocoa powder, or fruit etc. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! It mixes smooth and has no weird after taste! I HIGHLY recommend this to anyone searching for a great tasting NON chalky product! Its also great hot or cold! In the winter I heat it up at night for a "hot coco version"! GIVE IT A TRY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t focus on taste or others opinion of it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t have too much bad to say about this powder. They definitely can make them jars smaller for the amount of product that actually goes in. As far as the East goes I drink it with whole milk and find it drinkable. I don’t focus on the taste because that’s not why I drink them. If you can focus on the protein part you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mali The Creator

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor; chalky consistency
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is okay, but even when blended in my Nutribullet it's VERY chalky, and I can only use one scoop instead of the two-scoop serving because of this. I wish the texture was a bit better, but still one of the better protein powders out there overall. It will work if you are blending it, but I can't imagine it being as good when used with a shaker because of the consitency. The chocolate fudge flavor doesn't have the consistency issue, but I need vanilla when making fruit smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Even for vegan protein poweder, this tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few vegan protein powders on the market and this is by far the worst in terms of taste as well as texture. The first time I used it I added it to water in my shaker and it made me gag. There is a disgusting after taste that honestly does not taste like anything you should be eating. Flavor is masked slightly by adding plant-based milk or other ingredients but it is still very, very unpalatable and not worth the doctoring. The powder can't be mixed well by shaking either, you have to blend it. The near 5 star reviews for this are baffling to me. Many of them have to be fake or paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, Easy to mix, Good qty & price!
customer_reviews.text: A good tasting protein drink is like finding a good looking frog. Not so with this product, it's the best tasting out of all the protein powders I've tried! It also dissolves faster than those soy-based or whey-based products. A reviewer says you can get diarrhea from this, I think he probably drank it cold. Cold causes downward draining of body fluids = diarrhea. It applies to people w/ a weak Spleen qi. Never drink too much cold especially on an empty stomach if that's the case. Anyways the price is good here on AMZN and I feel like there's a lot of powder!
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sand on my tongue
customer_reviews.text: Even well blended it's still is powdery, for some reason when I drink it feels like fine sandpaper or sand going down my throat. It doesn't taste bad but I don't like the texture I ordered it by mistake and since apparently they don't do refunds or returns I am stuck with it so I figured why not drink it. I think I'll just give it to my toddler instead because I do not like it. Also the amount of carbohydrates pet serving is misleading. The description and the label say two different things. I did not get an upset stomach. Also does not taste good mixed with fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product but changed over time.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this protein powder for years and loved it. I always mix my powder with soy milk and it blended very well with a wonderful flavor. Finished a container and ordered a new one to find it to be a lot different in flavor. Not as great as the container before and it actually blended very clumpy. I'm guessing the mixture changed a bit which I know happens. Still has great quality ingredients but I had to ultimately switch to a different Gluten Free powder for my daily nutrient goals.
customer_reviews.author: BurstSword

customer_reviews.title: Unflavored version has 1g of Sugar not stated on Amazon (see picture).
customer_reviews.text: I like Orgain products, they are made of apparently good quality and taste good. I ordered the unflavored version because I did not want to consume all the erythritol and Stevia of the flavored version. But to my surprise when I received the product I check the nutrition facts in the label and it is different from the Amazon’s version. It has 1gram of Sugar. The Amazon nutrition label has 0 gram of Sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo P rez

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best protein powder on the market. It blends well, isn't chalky/lumpy, and doesn't leave a weird after taste. Here's a great smoothie recipe: Frozen strawberries or raspberries, spinach, PB powder, 2 scoops of Orgain Vanilla - I call it my PB&J smoothie because it's sooooo good. It's also very filling and doesn't give me any weird digestive issues. Note: This review is only for vanilla flavor. I have not tried the chocolate flavor yet.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Worse tasting protein I've ever tried in my life!!! (good ingredients though and great price!)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this protein powder due to the good list of ingredients, price and the amount of fiber....but WOW!, let me tell you that the taste of this protein powder is the worse I've ever tasted in my life! (and I've tried probably over 100 different kinds!) The price is great!...the ingredients are great!....but I'm just holding my nose while drinking this stuff since I don't want to waste it or return it. I even tried making a coffee/latte based drink with it like I've done before using other protein brands/flavors...and it still taste bad. The best way I can describe the taste is like a liquefied cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Heath S.

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff and it's good for you. Flavor and blendability could be better (I got vanilla). I ended up leaving it at my parents house and they still haven't touched the stuff due to the taste (lol). Frankly I kinda wish they just had a blank, neutral flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jayteebae

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vegan protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a protein powder snob. I saw this at Costco and thought, "why not try it?" I've had vegan protein powder before and it wasn't great. This, however, is fantastic. No weird aftertaste, top quality ingredients, and it mixes really well. Can't get better than that. Since getting this brand about a year ago, my other protein powders have taken a backseat. My only wish is that they had more flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy it! Price and quality is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect so I can’t give it 5 stars. This is by far the best protein shake I’ve ever had. The flavor is neutral, yes a little chalky but all these type of shakes are the same when it comes to texture. I stick with the vanilla flavor because I drink it every morning and can mix in almost anything without it tasting gross and getting boring. This is my breakfast, holds my hunger for about 4hrs+ (depending on my mood) - Best part, NO BLOATING!
customer_reviews.author: Rivera Family

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is crap, it has so many other ingredients that are not good. Gave me terrible diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Decided to switch over to a plant based protein powder after reading some stuff on the benefits and Orgain is better than what I was expecting! I've been reading reviews and gotten mixed opinions from friends about various plant based powders and was super worried about the taste. Perhaps my expectations were so low that it actually tastes pretty good! I will say that I have only used it with a blender and with additional ingredients like spinach, and sometimes I throw in half a banana. Blends well and has a bit of a nutty flavor. I LOVE it! And I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Helped me in my weight loss journey
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a ton of powders, pre made drinks and all the hyped up protein this and that's, but orgain has always been what I go back too. I am not by any means a gym rat or health nut, but am trying to be. I work long hours and try to eat good in this weight loss journey, these aren't gritty tasting, not too sweet but can be if you want it to be. I pre make the night before, refrigerate and then the next morning blender bottle shake it up and ready to go. Keeps me feeling full until lunch for sure. Has helped me in my journey to lose 40 pou ds so far.
customer_reviews.author: kms1994

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Arbonne!
customer_reviews.text: Vanilla is a great flavor if you want to mix it into a protein shake and not taste the flavor of the protein. The sweetness isn't overpowering. I love this product. I have tried a lot of gluten free and dairy free products. This one is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Weber

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste; does not blend
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. I made a shake twice and thought the bad taste and stomach ache was a fluke and that I had not mixed it well. However, the next time I used my Vitamix. Still had a horrible taste, and I still had a stomach ache. This was my second time purchasing this product, and due to the good reviews, I overlooked some bad qualities of the product. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Luciadelv

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like oil. Use twice the recommended liquid.
customer_reviews.text: Organic Plant Based Protein Powder, Vanilla Bean. This product tastes heavily like oil likely because it contains coffee creamer. It is not chalky and does not have a strong aftertaste, but the taste of the oil is pretty gnarly at the recommended serving ratio even when mixed with milk. It is also very sweet. Almost to sweet. Mixing the product with twice the recommended amount of liquid made it much more tollerable. I can taste the Chia seeds in the mix but it doesn't bother me anywhere near as much as the oil. Overall it's tolerable enough that I'll probably finish the can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the premixed single servings
customer_reviews.text: I took one sip, I cannot drink this. I like the premixed Orgain vanilla, and figured that this would be comparable and would make less waste. It's too sweet, but not like sugar, like artificially sweet, and mixed with water, it has a grainy texture. I feel terrible wasting it, but it is thoroughly unpalatable. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Good Breakfast Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flavor of this product and have purchased both the 1 lb and the 2 lb size at different times. This last round I purchased the 2 lb size and realized the container was only half full! So I poured the contents of the 2 lb container into the old 1 lb container and it fits perfectly and saves space. I didn't weigh it; too afraid of the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: RedOrchid45

customer_reviews.title: I still taste and feel the power
customer_reviews.text: I hate companies that show you that the product contains 21 grams of protein, and then you discover that what is meant is for every two scopes . I had to change the previous protein product because it was causing me stomach bloating, so I decided to use Vegan protein. Initially, I could not like to drink it, because I could feel and taste of the powder. I tried mixing it with strawberry and banana until it hides some flavor and it worked kind off. I don't think i will get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alhumaid

customer_reviews.title: Read the label carefully'
customer_reviews.text: This product contains an artificial sweetener than is made from alcohol. Sweetners made from derivatives cause me and others severe intestinal distress. Please read the label carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry W. Howington

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: I literally have to force myself to drink protein shakes because most of the time powder tastes disgusting- but not this powder!!! just tastes like vanilla! I blend 2 spoons with 1 banana and almond milk- very filling. the best protein I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Nigina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but in smaller container than at the stores
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product in my smoothies. It adds some thickness (I use water and not milk or yogurt), and the vanilla flavor works well with the fruit I put in my smoothies. Note that the container sold here is several ounces smaller than the ones I have bought at stores, so unless you get it on sale (it is often a daily deal), you're not really saving much per ounce. Of course it's great to have it delivered, and this is one product I am considering using to try out Amazon's automatic reorder and delivery program. As a protein powder, I recommend this without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protein powder because I was using soy based protein before until I read about how there is alot of GMO with soybeans so I decided to switch to an organic plant based alternative and I found this! I make some delicious smoothies now with one scoop of this protein powder, mixed with berries and almond milk. Also, since I try to not really eat anything passed 7pm this is a good alternative for me and as I mentioned, I love the taste! This is a very good product for people wanting to move away from soy based products as well as for people physically active. Overall, I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Siejack

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say!
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t much I can say that I dislike about this product. I think the flavor is really good, it mixes really well, I use a Blender Bottle or a Magic Bullet. There is a tiny bit of an aftertaste that I’ve noticed - only if I’m drinking coffee after I drink my protein shake. I think it’s perfect mixed with some frozen raspberries, frozen blueberries and almond milk. I’m not a vegan yet, but I plan on doing it for health. This is helping the transition go smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkie

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: I just could not get past the taste. It mixed well with lowfat milk. I got the vanilla bean flavor but there is some kind of taste that I just cannot stand! Organic products are usually either tasteless or taste awful. This one is awful. I am looking for a replacement but this went into the garbage (but I recycled the plastic container).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Athlete-Endorsed and Diabetic Aoproved!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17 yr old who is very concerned about what she puts into her body. I have tried different protein powders (she loves peanut-butter but doesn't prefer it as the main flavor in protein powders) and we've landed on this one! It's delicious mixed in water only. To "level up", we blend this in our smoothies. This has become a meal-replacement for me (Diabetic T2) and both of us are very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tay WalkingShield

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to on a healthier alternative to eating all the time. I love to snack... this mixed with breakfast essentials, chips seeds, and a scoop of powdered greens gives me all the nutrients I need. Gives me energy, and a longer lasting fuller feeling throughout the day; for almost half of the day. I also drink coffee every day, so I'm trying to find a way to add my coffee to it; because I'm a coffee nut. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lyn Royce Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Chalk-esque flavor
customer_reviews.text: My main complaints are the flavor and consistency. It tastes like chalk and it doesn’t dissolve/mix well if you just add plant milk or water. I’ve been putting it in smoothies to tone down the flavor and it blends well that way. I will say it makes me feel full much longer than if I had a regular smoothie in the morning without it and I feel energized. it’s not the worst in the world but I won’t buy it again after I use it up.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIE J. CAVANESS

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have the taste of whey protein powders obviously, but this is the better tasting vegan powders that I have tried. The ingredients and balance of nutrition is on point. The reason for trying is because I was trying a vegan diet and this powder was highly recommend. I since went back to eating animal protein and dairy, for other health reasons. I have since recommended this powder to anyone who ask for a vegan protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jareth

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess I can only review based on taste. The taste is not bad. I wouldn't go as far as to say good. But not bad at all. I got the vanilla kind. I mix it with smoothies and I put it in my split pea soup. The serving size calls for 2 scoops, but I put 1 scoop in each smoothie and 2 scoops in a 6 serving batch of soup. It blend into both things very well using an inversion blender. Not chunky at all. I'd imagine if I put 2 scoops in 1 smoothie it would not be quite so tasty
customer_reviews.author: Moment

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so good delivery!
customer_reviews.text: A friend made me a smoothie with this in it and I had to buy it for myself. To amazon..This powder was delivered to me damaged, so I couldn’t use it.. BUT I ended up buying the same powder from the store and I’m satisfied! It’s not chalky and blends great. It is sweet, so I just use one scoop. My favorite smoothie recipe is: 1 cup of ice, 1 banana, 1 cup of almond milk, dash of cinnamon and 1 scoop of the protein powder. It’s amazing and keeps me full for multiple hours. I have not had any stomach aches like some reviews have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried many proteins before, most containing dairy products. I found them difficult to digest and I was never able to finish one whole tub even though I switch to different brands and kinds. This is the only protein that is light on the stomach, easy to digest and taste soo good!! I can drink this by itself with just some almond milk or add fruits and veggies! I would highly recommend, plus it has much more natural ingredients than other brands. I use this as a meal replacement in the morning, or after a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Kmi

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan protein I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vegan protein powder I have ever tasted in my life. I am talking about Vanilla, I do not know about other flavors. It blends so easily. It's not gritty or grainy and doesn't taste like you're eating handfuls of dirt. I've tried dozens of vegan protein powders and this is by far the best I've ever had. I know we all have different taste buds, but this is definitely a top contender for all. I blend everyday with bananas, strawberries, cinnamon, and water. It's my breakfast on the go and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AWiggle

customer_reviews.title: it is really good!!
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS!!!!! I have been searching around for a plant based protein powder for months. After asking other reviewers (Thank you to everyone who got back to me!) I purchased this one. OMG, it is really good!!! It isn't gritty at all, which is what I had issues w/ other ones that I bought. It also dissolves completely after shaking it w/ a shaker ball for less than a minute. The flavor is sooo good that I find myself chugging it. I like to mix mine w/ almond milk and have been putting either apple pie or pumpkin pie spice in it. Yummy!!! I will be purchasing the chocolate one next!
customer_reviews.author: rocker chic81

customer_reviews.title: GROSS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST TASTING protein powder I’ve ever tried. It tastes sour. I made 2 different smoothies with it thinking the stuff I used was bad and they both tasted horrible. So I tried just a shake (coconut almond milk and the protein powder) and still it tastes sour. Maybe from being in the heat during transport, idk but this is FOUL!!! I’ve used Orgain (the chocolate one) before and I’ve had the ready made shakes and they DID NOT taste like this. I can’t even drink this. I would like a refund if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae 85 15

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Very good for fruit smoothies where you don't want to add another flavor like vanilla. Worth noting that I'm putting one serving into a ~24-32oz smoothie, so it's fairly diluted. Can't speak to using it in a 12oz smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chris King

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for over two years and it’s a great product. Never a twinge of stomach upset, blends easily, nice texture and good taste. This sounds petty but the powder compacts and often when I open a new container the powder level is 50%-60% of the container size. Might a better packaging option a smaller container, or flexible resealable pouch. Less packaging, less cost, more sustainable. It’s a great product! Try it!
customer_reviews.author: EdoardoG

customer_reviews.title: Best of the kind!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to include protein powder in my smoothies and this was the first one I’ve ever tried because it is plant-based. It’s great! I add about 3/4th of a scoop for 16 oz. (approx.) but if I add more it gives a powdery taste to the smoothie. This amount is great though - it keeps me full and energetic for a longer period of time versus having a smoothie with the same ingredients minus the protein powder. It doesn’t add a strong taste to my smoothies and that’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Orgain Organic Plant Based Protein Powder, Vanilla Bean - Vegan, Low Net Carbs, Non Dairy, Gluten Free, Lactose Free, No Sugar Added, Soy Free, Kosher, Non-GMO, 2.03 Pound (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Style:2.03 lb, Vanilla| *:PowderOrgain Organic Sweet Vanilla Bean Protein Powder is a naturally smooth and delicious nourishment drink with 21 grams of organic protein and 5 grams organic fiber per serving. Each serving grams is USDA organic, gluten free, kosher, vegan, non GMO, soy free. No artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. This protein shake powder is great to mix with water or milk post workout or while you're on the go through your busy day. This is great for the entire family including grams kids.
feature_bullets: Includes 1 (2.03 pound) orgain organic plant based vanilla bean protein powder
21 grams of organic plant based protein (pea, brown rice, chia seeds), 5 grams of organic dietary fiber, 5 grams of net carbs, 0 grams of sugar, 150 calories per serving
USDA organic, vegan, gluten free, dairy free, lactose free, low net carbs, no added sugar, soy free, kosher, non GMO, carrageenan free, and no artificial ingredients
Mix with water, milk, or your favorite protein shake recipe for a quick breakfast or snack drink. Use when bakin grams to give your cakes, muffins, brownies, or cookies a protein and energy boost
Ideal for healthy, on the go nutrition for men, women, and kids. These are great for meal replacement, smoothie boosters, building grams lean muscle, muscle recovery, and pre or post workouts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
